Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Lifestyle
Status: New Series
Network: BBC FOUR ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Wednesdays at 10:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: July 25, 2012

History Of The World In Three Colours is a documentary series presented by Dr James Fox. He discovers how, in the hands of artists, the colours of gold, blue and white have managed to stir our emotions and have even altered the course of history.


(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-32232)
